Pans House Privacy Policy

Does this WebApp use cookies?

No, but it does use HTML5 Web Storage, which is very similar.

How does this WebApp store data?

Pans House stores functional data using HTML5 Web Storage and user feedback in a database.

What data is stored?

Data stored in HTML5 Web Storage:

  • Learning outcomes are saved.

Data stored in database:

  • User feedback form.

How is data used?

  • Data is not shared with third parties.
  • Data is not used to track or monitor user behaviour.
  • Data is used to audit training quality.
